title: Provided where the area of rehab is less than the component of free sale, the component for free sale could be enhance upto 30% by the Municipal Commissioner in consultation with HPC
clause_text: Provided where the area of rehab is less than the component of free sale, the component for free sale could be enhance upto 30% by the Municipal Commissioner in consultation with HPC.
section: Consideration for Land falling under URS -
